cards.evo_description: No matter how many times it is lost, love abides. Don't you think that's just wonderful? Now come on... Show me that you love me!

cards.evo_description: Once those bandages have you in their grasp, your passage to the world of the dead is assured. But is that such a bad thing? It's nice and warm inside all this wrapping, you know. Maybe you should come on in here and see what you think...

cards.evo_description: So, you want to go beyond taboos? Then you need to kill! To drown the night in blood!

cards.evo_description: All you do is drink from morning till night, grumbling into your cups. You're like a living corpse. Why don't you try walking with your arms held straight out in front of you? Bet the look would suit you! —Barman at the Tavern

cards.evo_description: You war-weary souls, come to me and rest in the healing light of love. Close your eyes. As light bathes your body, feel the flame of courage ignite in you once more.

cards.description: Tsk, don't you ever get tired of chasing after me? I told you I was leaving. Leave me be—I slipped out of that circle.
cards.evo_description: I just can't sit around and wait for the day I finally die. That's why I left the forest behind and took up the sword. No more lying safe in my cradle. I walk my own path now.

cards.evo_description: What? You can't move! Oh! Didn't I tell you that I'm the spirit of a poisoned fen? Hee hee! The look of agony on your face is just priceless!

Ward.

cards.evo_description: The long, long journey that turns through life and the forest toward the future has only just begun. Surely someday we'll learn to ignore racial differences and live in peace.

cards.evo_description: Ever felt the steely tip of a rapier piercing your breast? Keep slacking off and you shall! We can rest when the battle's won, so hop to it!

cards.evo_description: The individual bunnies might be small, but they get this big once they join together! I wouldn't underestimate these spirits just because they're bunnies!

cards.evo_description: Humans caused these little ones to suffer and killed them. As a necromancer, I listen to them, and it's my duty to fulfill their wishes. This time it's the humans' turn to suffer...

cards.evo_description: Look, this isn't your domain, you know! This is my world! After all, it's my magic that's filling the place! I think I'll remind you which of us is more powerful.

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: Gain Drain if Vengeance is active for you.

cards.evo_description: My aching claw is just killing me! I beseech you! Show me your despair-filled eyes as my claw rips into your warm bowels!

cards.description: Yes, yes! More! Oh, is that all you have? But I was so enjoying myself. If that's all the fun you can offer, I'll just have to kill you.
cards.evo_description: That's more like it! Now, I think it's time to kick this up a notch, don't you agree? Don't go dying too quickly, you hear? Ah ha ha!

cards.evo_description: Hey, what are you looking at? Look at me, silly. See? Your body doesn't lie. I'm not about to let you get away. We'll do things you only dreamed of. And some you didn't.

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to your Forest Bats.
cards.description: I'm sooo tired of being stuck inside! And what's wrong with having a little fun on a night like this, when the moon's so beautiful? Come on, my little friend, you can join in as well!
cards.evo_description: Oh no... The sun's come out! Looks like the fun's over, then. Come on, let's get back to the mansion. You'll escort me, right my little friend?

cards.evo_skill_disc: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to both leaders.

cards.evo_description: Hrrr... Wh-What? My mind! I-It's melting... melting away... My mind is blank... and it feels good! Hrrr hrrr! It feels goood!

cards.evo_description: The thick stench of charred flesh in the air, ash raining down across a backdrop of jet-black skies... This is perhaps the perfect stage for a star like me. Now, on to the next performance!

cards.evo_description: Looks like I've overdone it! I can't believe I destroyed the ceiling! It's all your fault for being so weak!

Slowly, the titan of a soldier approached. His every step was a mighty quake, sending rattles and groans through the buildings. The villagers could only watch in horror.
cards.evo_description: Weapons, walls, pleas—none could halt the tempest of destruction. The village turned to rubble in a blink. The titanic soldier glanced at what lay at his feet, and then moved on in search of more prey, the earth rumbling with each step.

cards.description: It's our duty to inspect this desert—we need to make sure it's safe before people start to cross it! Now come on, let's head out!
cards.evo_description: The sun's relentless, and we're covered in sand, but we can't give up. The people are relying on us! Now come on! How about you and I lead the way?

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: Destroy a follower, and then return it to play.

cards.evo_description: I shall use my powers to free the future from the yoke of destiny. Do not become a prisoner of despair. A hopeful future can be yours... A future of freedom. Go ahead. Grasp it...

cards.evo_skill_disc: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to all followers.
cards.description: These duds are slick! Huh? You're looking mighty hungry...

cards.evo_description: My warnings go unheeded, then. A shame. Would that I could show you mercy. Do not struggle against the thorns, now. Foolish and ugly you may be, but at least you'll serve to fertilize the garden.

cards.skill_disc: Last Words: Summon a Mordecai the Duelist.
cards.evo_skill_disc: Last Words: Summon a Mordecai the Duelist.
cards.description: He seeks a never-ending duel to make his bloodless body burn with passion again.
cards.evo_description: He trains for an eternal duel to satisfy the cravings of his fleshless body.

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower. Add its attack and defense to this follower's attack and defense.
cards.description: A death god from the underworld who acquired the dead body of a demon king. She has offered countless souls to revive him as her loyal retainer.
cards.evo_description: The underworld death god hunted the souls of the living and offered them to her demon king. At last she has revived him as her puppet.

cards.skill_disc: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and draw a card.
cards.evo_skill_disc: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and draw a card.
cards.description: I am the living embodiment of revenge... I draw strength from the darkness within human hearts. Hatred... Envy... Soon this world will be filled with resentment!
cards.evo_description: The world is filled with hatred, and the time for revenge is upon us! My dark arts shall skewer the hearts of the hypocrites, and pin their souls to the tombstone of resentment!

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: Change both leaders' defense to 10, either by restoring defense or by dealing damage.
cards.description: Though my soul may fall, I shall never bow my head to such weak, stunted creatures as mortals. I still possess a measure of pride.
cards.evo_description: When the time came, we sounded the battle cry against the gods that deceived us... As fellow traitors, you are now compelled to follow me.

cards.description: Seven days to create it. One second to destroy it.

cards.skill_disc: Ward.
cards.evo_skill_disc: Ward.
cards.description: Commanded by a god to guard a sacred doorway, the giant has stood motionless for countless millennia.
cards.evo_description: The guardian of the sacred doorway continues to stand in unflinching silence, stirring only to swat away an occasional intruder.

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers. Then give +0/+2 to all other allied followers.
cards.description: Fellow soldiers! I hereby make a vow upon this spear! We are protected from on high! Our victory is assured!
cards.evo_description: I hereby make a vow in the name of God! We shall win this battle, even if I must give my life to do so! Now come! Follow me into the fray!

cards.skill_disc:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Summon an Awakened Seraph.
cards.description: There was once a shattered statue sleeping in a lost capital. But only the birds saw it, as no man ever entered that forbidden land.

cards.skill_disc:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Summon a Renascent Seraph.
cards.description: The statue depicted a legendary angel who once fought to protect humanity. There were those who offered their prayers to this angel, and kept her in their hearts.

cards.skill_disc:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Summon a Seraph Lapis, Glory Be.
cards.description: Over the course of many years, the prayers of the innocent gradually weakened the hold of an ancient curse on the angel, slowly restoring her to glory.

cards.skill_disc:
Countdown (1)
Last Words: Win the match.
cards.description: The nameless seraph will be resurrected by the pure hearts and innocent prayers of humanity. She will be a radiant light to guide this world.

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: Increase your evolution points to 3.
cards.description: I welcome you, my new brethren in a world of chaos! Our clan's victories on the battlefield will surely be a blow to the gods.
cards.evo_description: Today, my new brethren, we embark on a journey that will start with bloodshed but will one day lead us to a new world!

cards.skill_disc: Draw a card. Then deal X damage to an enemy. X equals the number of cards in your hand.
cards.description: Go, my silver; cleanse this green land of evil.

cards.skill_disc: Last Words: Summon a Leonidas's Resolve.
cards.evo_skill_disc: Last Words: Summon a Leonidas's Resolve.
cards.description: A true king is not measured by his achievements in life but rather by his ability to inspire his soldiers in death.
cards.evo_description: He fought with his spear until it snapped, his sword until it shattered, and finally with his fists. The king bellowed as he scattered legions. Even if he'd fallen, his people would have spoken of him long after his death.

cards.skill_disc: Whenever an allied follower comes into play, give it +3/+3 and Rush.
cards.description: The great king has fallen. And yet his army continues marching to the cadence of his commands.

cards.skill_disc:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Spellboost: Deal 1 more.
cards.description: A mad alchemist's creation. Though he lost his master, he rages on, compelled to carry out the alchemist's orders.
cards.evo_description: Before long, the golem is stopped by the walls of the castle to which his master was exiled. Oblivious to this fact, he silently raises his fist to begin his assault.

cards.skill_disc: Deal 8 damage to an enemy follower.
cards.description: This calamitous curse signals extermination.

cards.description: The light of the orbs can cleanse any impurity, and eradicate any evil. Human lives, human lands... All are trifling concerns compared to the light's pure power.
cards.evo_description: The incandescent light of the dragon's orbs can raze the land to the ground. If you value your life, pray that you are never exposed to their glow.

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to all other followers.
cards.description: An evil serpent that lusts for gold. A brutal creature, it has been known to use its steely jaws to mash into tiny pieces those who come in search of its treasures.
cards.evo_description: Its body shrouded in a golden gleam, its eyes shining with an evil greed... Those who dare intrude upon its sanctuary are sliced open with sharp claws and drowned in their own blood.

cards.skill_disc: At the start of your turn, summon a Windblast Dragon.
cards.description: The cacophony of roars shakes the heavens and the earth.

cards.description: When the gate to the Dead World is opened, the lost lord will be reborn. Humanity, the heavens, and the earth will bear the cost.
cards.evo_description: The lord's flesh has been smeared with the unclean blood of corpses from the underworld, but his sword continues to gleam as it has for millennia, ready to be wielded against the ranks of the living.

cards.evo_description: Andras is a harbinger of the icy darkness. All touched by his blade of frost are doomed to spend eternity as statues.

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to an enemy. Restore 5 defense to your leader.

cards.evo_description: Cast aside your facade and forget about the time, for tonight we revel. Tonight, you will surrender to the tantalizing taste of my company!

cards.evo_skill_disc: Whenever an enemy follower attacks, give it -2/-0.

cards.evo_description: The incandescent dragon has the power to rob the forces of evil of their desire to do battle. Darkness cannot hope to withstand its dazzling glow.

cards.skill_disc: Fanfare: Replace your deck with an Apocalypse Deck.
cards.description: The would-be usurper of Heaven, cast into the pits of Hell, has risen again in a cloak of flame. Soon this underworld king shall spark an apocalypse that paints all mortals and gods in blood.
cards.evo_description: The king of the underworld and his gathered armies of darkness reveled in the coming of the day of revelation. Chaos and destruction tore through the world in a dance of madness, staining all in despair.

cards.skill_disc: Deal damage to the enemy leader until their defense drops to 1.
cards.description: Your fate's reached the end of its thread.

cards.evo_description: Freed from its bonds, the demon's true nature was revealed. Driven by overwhelming fury, it scorched the world with its hateful flames.

cards.skill_disc: Storm.
cards.evo_skill_disc: Storm.

cards.evo_description: Creation is as simple as infusing the sea with life, while destruction is as simple as summoning a whirlpool to swallow the land. Everything comes from water, and one day, everything will return there...
